name: NHL.com GameCenter
description: This is a style specifically for the new GameCenter-mode style that is used when games are currently under way. This stylesheet does not take into acount the standard nhl.com site as of this version. Mostly removing items in this version, slimming it down and changing basic things such as heights and widths.
additional_info:
Version 1 - 2014.03.15
- Removes: language selection/login link at top, Geico Quote of the Day image, NHL shield to the left of the scoreboard scroll, whatever GameCenter links I could find, any other ads, huge copyright block at the bottom of the page.

- Gave scoreboard scroll drop shadow and made it wider.
